course_title: Pediatric Primary Care Nurse Practitioner III
course_description: Students refine their diagnostic and management skills while appraising health outcomes for well, acutely, and chronically ill or injured pediatric patients in primary care settings. Team and clinical leadership skills are emphasized as the student prepares to transition to the APRN role.
prerequisites: NRSG 620D prerequisite and NRSG 655D as co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit. Student must enroll in NRSG 655D first.
sections: Class Nbr: 5268, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
